mapper.sql: SELECT i.item_id, i.parent_id, i.u_id, i.item_name, i.item_place, i.item_unit, i.item_sex, i.item_amount, i.athlete_amount, i.start_time, i.edit_time, i.create_time, i.end_time, se.season_id, se.season_name, se.season_status, u.user_id, u.user_no, u.user_sex, u.nickname FROM `item` i INNER JOIN `season` se ON i.se_id = se.season_id INNER JOIN `user` u ON i.u_id = u.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item(parent_id,se_id,u_id, item_name, item_place, item_unit, item_sex, item_amount,athlete_amount, start_time, end_time, create_time, edit_time) VALUES (#{parentId},#{season.seasonId},#{user.userId}, #{itemName}, #{itemPlace}, #{itemUnit}, #{itemSex}, #{itemAmount},#{athleteAmount}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createTime}, #{editTime})
mapper.select: SELECT item_id, parent_id, item_name, item_unit, item_amount FROM item WHERE parent_id IS NULL

SELECT item_id, parent_id, item_name, item_unit, item_amount FROM item
